;Thursday, September 21, 2023
; ;

;“Development is the master key to solving all problems.”

;

;Global economic fluctuations are declining, geopolitics Crises are escalating, development imbalances are worsening, unilateralism and protectionism are on the rise... Faced with endless global challenges, the international community has become increasingly eager for common development, and the concept of common development has become increasingly popular in practice.

;

;On September 21, 2021, President Xi Jinping delivered an important speech at the general debate of the 76th United Nations General Assembly, proposing a global development initiative to promote the international community to form a synergy and solve the development deficit problem. The realization of the United Nations 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development has contributed Chinese solutions and Chinese wisdom.

;

;The road is never isolated, and together we can go far.

;

;In the two years since the Global Development Initiative was proposed, it has effectively built an international consensus on jointly promoting development, responded to the most urgent needs of the international community, and has been widely praised by the international community. The proposal and implementation of global development initiatives conform to the wishes of the people, inject more impetus into the world's joint development, and demonstrate China's responsibility.

;

;;Coping with global challenges;

;

;;Contributing Chinese wisdom;

;

;Development carries the people’s yearning for a better life , is the top priority for developing countries and an eternal theme of human society. The century-old changes are accelerating and the historical trend of the collective rise of developing countries is irreversible. The voice and willingness to unite, cooperate and seek common development have never been stronger. How to solve the development deficit and solve the development dilemma has become an era issue facing human society.

;

;“I proposed the global development initiative to focus the world on development and provide assistance for the implementation of the sustainable development agenda.” From September 2021, it was proposed at the general debate of the 76th United Nations General Assembly Global development initiative, by presiding over the Global Development High-Level Dialogue in June 2022 to announce 32 pragmatic measures, and by attending the "BRICS+" Leaders' Dialogue in August 2023 to make important expositions on global development cooperation, President Xi Jinping has always focused on the world. In order to achieve the long-term goal and practical needs of common development, we propose the global development initiative and continuously enrich its connotation, leading the promotion of this major initiative to take root, deepening and practicality, and injecting strong impetus into promoting the common development of all countries.

;

;On the occasion of the second anniversary of the launch of the Global Development Initiative, a high-level meeting to showcase the cooperation results of the Global Development Initiative was held at the United Nations Headquarters in New York on the 19th local time. Xinhua News Agency’s national high-end think tank released the "Global Development Initiative" during the meeting "Practical Achievements and World Contribution" think tank report comprehensively reviews the fruitful results achieved by the Global Development Initiative in the two years since it was proposed, and systematically elaborates on the concepts, principles and world significance of this major initiative.

;

;Wang Xiaojun, director of the Fund of the United Nations Office for South-South Cooperation who attended the meeting, said in an interview with Xinhua News Agency that the cases shown in the report show that global development initiatives have brought benefits to people all over the world, including the construction in Mongolia Livable housing, supporting school meals in Nepal and Cambodia, launching the “Bamboo Replaces Plastic” campaign in African countries, providing COVID-19 vaccine assistance to Palestinian refugees, etc. These cases vividly demonstrate the comprehensive scope of cooperation in global development initiatives.

;

;Wang Xiaojun believes that the concept of the Global Development Initiative is highly in line with the needs of today's world. It has created a new model of open and inclusive international development cooperation in terms of building global partnerships for South-South and trilateral cooperation. The world is facing complex challenges, and global development initiatives have made a strong contribution to placing development issues at the center of the international agenda.

;

;Robert Lawrence Kuhn, chairman of the Kuhn Foundation in the United States, said that the global development initiative is based on China’s own development experience, solves global development problems, and at the same time benefits the majority of developing countries through specific actions, and has a great impact on the world. Development has important practical significance.

;

;“President Xi Jinping’s initiative will bring the hard-hit sustainable development goals back to the core of the global multilateral agenda.” Solomon Islands Prime Minister Sogavare said. Former Slovenian President Turk said: "China's global development initiatives provide key constructive force to address global development challenges."

;

;We are committed to achieving stronger, greener and healthier global development and jointly create A development pattern that is inclusive, balanced, coordinated and inclusive, win-win cooperation, and common prosperity. Since the global development initiative was proposed, the concept has been continuously enriched, the implementation mechanism has been continuously improved, the promotion path has become clearer, and pragmatic cooperation has gradually been implemented, effectively responding to global challenges and development needs of developing countries. Melaku Mulualem, a senior fellow at the Ethiopian Institute of Strategic Affairs, said: "Whether it is thought leadership or implementation, the global development initiative provides a clear roadmap for countries."

;

;As the world As the largest developing country in the world and a natural member of the Global South, China has always placed its own development in the coordinate system of human development, adhered to the people-centered development concept, actively shared experience with other countries, provided assistance, and promoted global South-South cooperation. Steady and far-reaching progress. From deepening international cooperation in the fight against the epidemic to assisting international poverty reduction; from helping African and other developing countries to alleviate debt pressure, to promoting global trade, digital economy, green transformation, and ensuring food and energy security, China has always worked closely with the vast number of developing countries. Countries work side by side to make positive contributions to global development.

;

;Nicaraguan President Ortega said: "China's help to the people of Asia, Africa and Latin America has no strings attached and has made important contributions to promoting social progress and people's well-being in developing countries." British International Relations Consultant Keith Bennett said: “President Xi Jinping’s concepts of ‘people-centeredness’ and ‘strive to leave no country behind’ are crucial to improving the fairness, effectiveness, and inclusiveness of global development, and are highly regarded by the international community. Widely recognized and generally welcomed."

;

;;Cracking development bottlenecks;

;

;;Injecting Chinese power;

;

;In the new era of COVID-19 Affected by negative factors such as the epidemic, intensified geopolitical conflicts, "decoupling and disconnection" promoted by the United States and the West, and extreme fiscal and monetary policies, global development bottlenecks have become increasingly prominent in recent years, global poverty reduction results have been affected, the growth rate of some emerging markets has slowed, and food The energy crisis and other challenges are intertwined, and high inflation has made people's livelihood in many countries difficult.

;

;“The root cause of world chaos is the lack of development.” David Monyaei, director of the Africa-China Research Center at the University of Johannesburg, South Africa, said, “Promoting the implementation of global development initiatives will help reduce challenges and alleviate Crisis, thereby strengthening our security."

;

;Weisheng Zhou, a professor at Ritsumeikan University in Japan, believes that as a developing country, China has accumulated a lot of valuable development experience in the process of reform and opening up for more than 40 years. The global development initiative is based on both China's development experience and the goal of sustainable human development, and is of great practical significance and operability.

;

;“The Global Development Initiative focuses on development bottlenecks, and relevant countries have benefited a lot from it.” Kuhn, who has long been concerned about China’s development, believes that China’s professional knowledge and experience provide long-term and critical support to developing countries.

;

;The Global Development Initiative focuses on key areas such as green development, new industrialization, and digital economy, promotes partnership building for the new industrial revolution, and supports high-quality development.

;

;In Southeast Asia and Africa, Chinese companies rely on new business formats such as cloud computing, e-commerce, and financial technology to promote economic and trade exchanges between all parties and help optimize the local development environment. In Latin America and Central Asia, Chinese companies have participated in projects such as wind farms, hydropower stations, and photovoltaic power stations to help local areas transition to low-carbon. In many places around the world, connectivity has achieved fruitful results. Cooperation projects such as the China-Laos Railway and the Stentrang-Grochima Mekong River Bridge in Cambodia have greatly facilitated local transportation and played a significant role in promoting economic and social development.

;

;Sikun, a senior Lao diplomat, said that the world today is still facing challenges such as the sluggish post-epidemic recovery and the Ukraine crisis, and Laos has also been affected. However, because of the China-Laos railway, Laos’ tourism industry has been able to recover quickly, and goods Smoother transportation has helped Laos' economy recover more quickly from numerous challenges.

;

;“China has always been sincere and took positive actions to help countries get rid of poverty.” Ronny Lins, director of the Brazilian Center for China Studies, said that in the two years since the Global Development Initiative was proposed, China has been promoting the global South. In terms of development, it has shown stronger action, created more development opportunities for developing countries including Latin American countries, and played a role in improving people's livelihood, which is conducive to the sustainable development of the world economy and human society.

;

;Waleed Jabala, a professor of economics and financial law at Cairo University in Egypt, said that China has proposed solutions for development, and many countries hope to use these "keys" to solve their development problems. "We can see China's initiatives reflected in real projects every day."

;

; ;Let's start a new development path together  ;

;

; ; ;;Showing China’s Responsibility;

;

;The more complex and severe the international situation becomes, the more countries need to adhere to true multilateralism. Global development is inseparable from international cooperation. China holds high the banner of multilateralism, gathers global development forces with the concepts of openness, inclusiveness, and win-win cooperation, and demonstrates its responsibility as a major country.

;

;Helga Zepp LaRouche, founder and chairman of the German think tank Schiller Institute, believes that the current world must stop brinkmanship and get rid of unilateralism. President Xi Jinping's global development initiative and many other proposals are conducive to resolving the current dilemma.

;

;“The international community must serve the interests of the world and the people at heart, and push development issues back to the core of the international agenda.” China has provided development assistance to more than 160 countries and cooperated with more than 150 countries. Countries have joined hands to build the Belt and Road Initiative, and have jointly promoted cooperation on global development initiatives with more than 100 countries and international organizations.

;

;At the "BRICS+" leaders' dialogue held not long ago, President Xi Jinping announced that China has established a global development and South-South cooperation fund totaling US$4 billion, and Chinese financial institutions are about to launch a US$10 billion fund. US dollars are earmarked for the implementation of global development initiatives.

;

;From Asia to Africa, from Pacific island countries to the Caribbean coast, more than 200 cooperation projects have come to fruition, and cooperation mechanisms in poverty reduction, education, health and other fields have continued to expand. China launched the China-UN Food and Agriculture Organization South-South Cooperation Trust Fund to implement special actions to promote food production and share agricultural technical knowledge; it launched a global clean energy partnership to help achieve energy security.

;

; Regarding the global development initiative, President Xi Jinping said: "This initiative is a public good open to the world, aiming to align with the United Nations 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development and promote common global development. China is willing to join hands with all parties Cooperate to jointly promote the implementation of initiatives and strive not to leave any country behind."

;

;Jabala has deep feelings about this. He said that the global development initiative aims to guide the world towards a better future by promoting cooperation and building partnerships, which reflects the inclusive spirit of the Chinese people.

;

;The Chinese nation pursues "the great road and the world is for the common good", advocates "being kind to neighbors and harmonious to all nations", and advocates "working in harmony and helping each other". The Global Development Initiative is rooted in this excellent traditional Chinese culture and is committed to promoting the international community to continuously enhance cooperation consensus, strengthen the docking of development strategies at all levels, broaden cooperation channels, and ultimately achieve joint development and common progress.

;

;Virtue is never alone, it must have neighbors. At present, more than 100 countries and international organizations support the global development initiative, and more than 70 countries have joined the "Group of Friends of the Global Development Initiative". The global development initiative has been included in a series of cooperation between China and Central Asia, ASEAN, Africa, Latin America, Pacific Island countries, etc. Document... China is willing to work with all progressive forces in the world to build a high-quality global development partnership that is united, equal, balanced and beneficial to all, start a new journey of building a global development community with a shared future, and jointly move towards a more prosperous and better future.

;Data source: China Enterprises United Meeting with China Entrepreneurs Association
;Drawing: Zhang Fangman

;Hefei September of this newspaper Report on the 20th (Reporter Liu Zhiqiang) The China Enterprise Confederation and the China Entrepreneurs Association released the 2023 Top 500 Chinese Enterprises list in Hefei, Anhui Province on the 20th. The list uses company operating income in 2022 as the entry criteria. 264 manufacturing companies are on the list, 8 more than the previous year and maintaining growth for the third consecutive year. The list shows that this year's "Top 500" continues to maintain a growth trend, with total operating income of 108.36 trillion yuan, an increase of 5.74% over the previous year's "Top 500"; total assets are 399.77 trillion yuan, an increase over the previous year's "Top 500" 27.24 trillion yuan, an increase of 7.31%; the entry threshold has been raised for 21 consecutive years. This year's "Top 500" entry threshold is 46.998 billion yuan, an increase of 2.373 billion yuan over the previous year.

;

;For the first time, more than half of the companies have reached the level of 100 billion. The number of "Top 500" companies with operating income exceeding 100 billion yuan increased to 254, a net increase of 10. Among them, 16 companies have operating income exceeding 1 trillion yuan.

;

;R&D investment and R&D intensity continue to increase. The "Top 500" invested a total of 1.578688 billion yuan in research and development expenses, an increase of 131.221 billion yuan over the previous year, an increase of 9.07%. The average R&D intensity continued to increase, reaching a new high of 1.85%, an increase of 0.04 percentage points compared with the previous year's "Top 500".

;

;The number and quality of patents continue to improve. The "Top 500" applied for a total of 1.8853 million patents; the number of patent applications increased by 217,300 compared with the previous year's "Top 500", an increase of 13.03%. Among them, 743,400 invention patents were applied for, an increase of 10.48% over the previous year's "Top 500". The number of invention patents has continued to grow for five consecutive years, accounting for 39.43% of the number of patents.

;

;Activity in participating in standard setting has increased. The "Top 500" have applied for a total of 75,110 applications to participate in the formulation of standards, an increase of 171 items compared with the previous year. The number of enterprises applying to participate in the formulation of standards has increased for the fourth consecutive time. Actively participating in the formulation of international standards, enterprises have declared to participate in the formulation of 4,992 international standards.

;

;Per capita operating income continues to grow. The per capita operating income of the "Top 500" was 3.3022 million yuan, an increase of 142,600 yuan over the previous year.

;; Thu, 21 Sep 2023 06:26:06 +0800 01版要闻 - 李强主持召开国务院常务会议http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/21/nw.D110000renmrb_20230921_3-01.htm
;Thursday, September 21, 2023
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, September 20th  Premier Li Qiang of the State Council chaired an executive meeting of the State Council on September 20th. Study the work related to accelerating the promotion of new industrialization, review and adopt the "Special Action Plan for Cleaning Up Arrears of Enterprise Accounts", listen to the report on the supervision and investigation of promoting the sustained economic recovery, and review and adopt the "Regulations on the Internet Protection of Minors (Draft)".

;

;The meeting emphasized the need to thoroughly study and implement General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important exposition on promoting new industrialization, deeply analyze and grasp the changes in domestic and international situations and the phased characteristics of my country’s new industrialization, do a solid job in various key tasks, and comprehensively Improve the quality, efficiency and international competitiveness of industrial development. We must insist on promoting the transformation and upgrading of traditional industries and cultivating and strengthening strategic emerging industries, accelerate the development of advanced manufacturing, coordinately promote digital industrialization and industrial digitization, and strive to make up for shortcomings, lengthen long boards, and forge new boards. We must persist in deepening reform and expanding opening up, fully mobilize the enthusiasm of all types of business entities, give full play to the supporting role of the national unified market, guide the rational layout of industries with the main functional area strategy, make good use of the resources of both domestic and international markets, and effectively strengthen the promotion of new industrialization of dynamic vitality.

;

;The meeting pointed out that solving the problem of corporate account arrears is related to the company's production, operation and investment expectations, and is related to the continued recovery of the economy and must be highly valued. Provincial-level governments must take overall responsibility for the settlement of arrears in their regions, promptly resolve the issue of government arrears with corporate accounts, and untie the "chain" of mutual arrears between companies. Central and state-owned enterprises must take the lead in repayment. It is necessary to highlight substantive repayment, strengthen policy support, overall planning, supervision and assessment, strive to make all dues clear, and strive to build a long-term mechanism.

;

;The meeting heard a report on the supervision and research on promoting the sustained economic recovery. The meeting emphasized that all regions and departments should attach great importance to and keep a close eye on the problems discovered in the inspection and investigation, treat the "problem list" as a "responsibility list", and promptly implement rectifications one by one, draw inferences from one example to expand the rectification results, and make timely adjustments to We will "look back" on the rectification situation and strive to promote the implementation of the policies and measures that have been introduced. In response to the opinions and suggestions collected during the inspection and survey, relevant departments should, in accordance with the division of responsibilities, coordinate and consider and conduct in-depth research on the planning of next year's economic work, accelerate the introduction of relevant policies and implementation of work, and further consolidate the continued recovery of the economy.

;

;The meeting pointed out that minors are the future of the country and the hope of the nation. It is necessary to build solid legal support for the protection of minors online, promote all relevant parties to strictly implement their responsibilities for protecting minors online, guide and support relevant enterprises to actively implement regulations, achieve compliance operations, and promote the healthy growth of minors.

;

;Other matters were also considered at the meeting.

;Thursday, September 21, 2023
; ;

;General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that carrying out cooperation between the east and the west and targeted assistance is an important step for the Party Central Committee to promote coordinated regional development and promote common development. Big decisions made by FE. It is necessary to adapt to changes in the situation and tasks, focus on consolidating and expanding the results of poverty alleviation, comprehensively promote rural revitalization, and deepen cooperation between the east and the west and targeted assistance.

;

;Since Guangzhou City of Guangdong Province paired up with Qiannan Buyi and Miao Autonomous Prefecture of Guizhou Province in 2013, in the past 10 years, the east-west collaboration work of Guangzhou City has gradually expanded to Bijie City and Anshun City of Guizhou Province, and cooperation projects have been carried out one after another. The land of Guizhou has taken root. In addition, the two provinces of Guangdong and Fujian jointly issued a counterpart cooperation implementation plan between Guangzhou City and Longyan City at the beginning of this year. Later, the two cities signed a counterpart cooperation framework agreement, clarifying cooperation in ten key areas.

;

;Measure the distance between mountains and sea and explore the answer to rural revitalization. Recently, reporters visited Fujian and Guizhou provinces to feel the "Guangzhou mark" on the road to common prosperity.

;

; ; "One out, one in" to make up for the shortcomings;

;

;In 2007, the first laying hen farm was put into operation; now, it has 1.5 million eggs The daily production capacity of Bijie Shengyuan Egg Industry Co., Ltd. is the development speed of Bijie Shengyuan Egg Industry Co., Ltd. Due to their high quality and good taste, the eggs produced by the company are in short supply in the Guangzhou market.

;

;Contrary to the current hot demand, before 2016, Shengyuan Egg Industry’s eggs could only be sold to other sellers and entered the Guangzhou market under OEM brands. "Until the beginning of 2017, under the coordination of the Guangzhou East-West Poverty Alleviation Cooperation Working Group in Bijie, supermarkets in Guangzhou began to purchase our eggs directly." Zhang Yongjian, the person in charge of Shengyuan Egg Industry, said that the company then ushered in a new stage of rapid development. .

;

;Developing characteristic industries is an important way to achieve rural revitalization. "In the past, due to factors such as small production scale, high transportation costs, and weak brand effects, the contradiction between 'good quality and high price' for Guizhou's agricultural and sideline products was prominent." Zhang Shixue, director of the Comprehensive Research Division of the Guangzhou Municipal Cooperation Office, introduced the Guangdong-Guizhou Cooperation Task Force The Guangzhou Group has promoted many high-quality local products including eggs, vegetables, rice, pumpkins, etc., to "go out of the mountains" through a series of measures such as cultivating business entities, improving product quality, building consumption platforms, and enriching consumption scenarios. Data show that in the first eight months of this year, Guangzhou’s sales of assistance products from Bijie, Qiannan, and Anshun reached 6.57 billion yuan.

;

;In order to take into account both agricultural production and have a more stable income channel, the key is to bring industrial projects into villages.

;

;Affix labels to clothes, press the machine to press the logo, tear off the remaining plastic sheets, and put the clothes into the basket... The whole work process is orderly. As a staff member of the quality department of Tifel Clothing Co., Ltd. in Duyun City, Qiannan Province, Yang Naying is very satisfied with her job. "It is close to home and I can participate in leisure activities with my family during holidays."

;

;Yang Naying is not an exception. As a garment company with more than 260 workers, 80% of the workers at Tifel Clothing Company live within 3 kilometers of the factory. In Guizhou, where a large number of people are relocating, companies like Tifel Clothing are becoming an important help for local people to move, live stably, and become rich. Data show that in 2022, Bijie, Qiannan, and Anshun will introduce 193 new investment enterprises from Guangdong, with an actual investment of 8.289 billion yuan, absorbing 17,645 rural labor jobs.

;

; ; "One extension, one liter" forged long plate;

;

;Quality and health attributes are the advantages of Guizhou's agricultural products, but the sales of primary agricultural products have always faced a lack of added value. Problems such as high temperature and many seasonal restrictions. To this end, the Guangzhou Group of the Guangdong-Guizhou Cooperation Task Force strives to keep value-added benefits in rural areas and for farmers by extending the industrial chain.

;

;Spring water with a temperature of less than 20 degrees Celsius gushes out from the mountains. After passing through artificial ditches, it becomes faster and rushes into the contiguous fish ponds. Sturgeons of different sizes swim among them, splashing out from time to time. This is Jiaqi Aquatic Products Breeding Co., Ltd. in Huishui County, Guizhou. In the workshop not far from the fish pond, more than 30 workers are busy. The processed sturgeon will be divided into skin, bones, meat and other parts, and transported to Guangzhou through cold chain logistics.

;

;“Sturgeon processing and cooking requirements are high, and it is difficult for ordinary families to prepare sturgeon dishes by themselves, so we have been selling to catering companies, but sales have never increased.” Huishui County Sturgeon Association President Zhang Cuilan introduced that in March 2021, a food processing company from Guangzhou came to Huishui County, and the two parties hit it off and used sturgeon meat to make fish balls. "After improving several key aspects such as taste and packaging, our fish ball products have been widely praised by the market, driving the price of sturgeon out of the pond from a low of about 9 yuan per catty to about 20 yuan today.";

;Similar to sturgeon, Guizhou's local specialty fruit prickly pear is used as raw material. Guangzhou Pharmaceutical Group has developed a series of products called "Cixing Ningji". Sales revenue will reach 1.2 billion yuan in 2022, driving the prickly pear planting area to exceed 2 million acres, benefiting 65,000 farmers, helping Guizhou prickly pear become a tens-billion-yuan industry. "GPharma Group provides strong support for strengthening, replenishing and extending the chain, thereby driving upstream and downstream industries to share value-added dividends." said Ye Jizeng, deputy general manager of Wanglaoji Health Company of GPHL.

;

;As an important domestic tourism destination, Guizhou’s tourism industry plays an important role in promoting high-quality development. Focusing on improving tourism industrialization and service capabilities, Guangzhou has actively explored aspects such as financial support and team building.

;

;In the Millennium Buyi Ancient Village Scenic Area, a national 4A-level scenic spot located in Gaodang Village, Zhenning Buyi and Miao Autonomous County, Anshun City, villager Wu Wenfenzheng and her daughter Yang Pinglian make batik crafts. After entering September, the number of tourists in the scenic spot dropped compared with the summer vacation, so they had free time to make new batik works. In the past two months, July and August, their batik experience classes have welcomed batches of tourists.

;

;Since 2021, thanks to the assistance and cooperation of Yuexiu District, Guangzhou City, Gaodang Village has been successfully selected as a demonstration site for the in-depth integration of rural tourism with traditional villages and ethnic minority characteristic villages in Guizhou Province in 2022. With the help of East-West With the cooperation funds from the Ministry of Education, we have improved the construction of infrastructure such as bonfire squares and camping bases. Not only that, Guangzhou Guangzheng International Travel Service Co., Ltd., a subsidiary of Lingnan Business Travel Group, has also dispatched a dedicated team to Gaodang Village to help Gaodang Village comprehensively improve its tourist resources, tourism product development, and service standards. This summer, the scenic spot received more than 24,000 valid ticket-buying tourists, and its operating income reached 860,000 yuan, both of which achieved multiple growth year-on-year.

;

;“The all-round capability improvement has brought positive feedback from tourists.” Wen Qian, Vice President of Guangzhou Guangzhou Travel, said that from the active participation of Guangdong tourists in the “Millions of Guangzhou Travel Guizhou” to the Bijie Qiannan Tour Package Seat sales are booming. This summer, the advantages and attractiveness of Guizhou’s cultural tourism resources are accelerating.

; With a helping hand, then, as the results of poverty alleviation continue to be consolidated and rural revitalization work accelerates, the trend of "two-way rush" between the two places is becoming increasingly obvious. Among them, various business entities from Guangzhou have also found their own sense of gain.

;

;Zeng Aisheng, chairman of Zhijin County Nongyao Agricultural Development Co., Ltd. in Guizhou Province, used to do business in the fruit and vegetable wholesale market in Guangzhou, and later invested and built a factory in Guizhou. After passing several thresholds of variety control and market development, under the deployment of the county party committee and county government, Nongyao Agriculture's pumpkin processing industry has now driven the planting of about 150,000 acres, and its products are sold overseas.

;

;Pan Yahong, the person in charge of Guizhou Yuehui Health Technology Co., Ltd., led the team to actively develop local specialty agricultural products such as turmeric, monk fruit, and prickly pear. Through the extraction and deep processing of medicinal and food homologous products, primary The high value-added transformation of agricultural products achieved sales revenue of more than 1.6 million yuan in the first half of the year.

;

;Zhang Tianrong, chairman of Guizhou Yungui Agricultural Development Co., Ltd., had been engaged in agricultural product sales business in Guangzhou City for a long time, and later moved to Dafang County, Bijie City to participate in agricultural production. Today, the company has eight self-operated cold chain logistics vehicles, and more than 500 tons of vegetables are transported to Guangzhou through the cold chain every day during peak production periods.

;

;…………

;

;Large enterprises have also found support for development here.

;

;“The students from the ‘GAC Class’ are hard-working and carry out the master’s instructions meticulously.” According to Min Wenyong, a staff member of the electrical technician studio of GAC Passenger Vehicle Co., Ltd., these students are members of the GAC Group as a large-scale manufacturing company. The types of talents that state-owned enterprises most need to reserve. The GAC class mentioned by Min Wenyong is the result of the in-depth school-enterprise cooperation between Bijie Vocational and Technical College and GAC Group.

;

;Through the East-West Collaboration Mechanism, Guangzhou City and Bijie City have strengthened cooperation in the field of vocational education and established the Guangzhou-Bijie Human Resources Development Collaborative Industry-Education Alliance. Large enterprises such as Guangzhou Port Group, Guangzhou Metro Group, and Guangzhou Radio Group have successively signed school-enterprise cooperation agreements with Bijie Vocational and Technical College, covering 18 majors in the fields of automobiles, industry, and construction, including "Guangdong Technician, Cantonese Cuisine Chef, and Southern Guangdong Housekeeping" The major engineering order class has enrolled more than 1,800 students.

;

;Today, the scope of Guangzhou’s promotion of industrial cooperation is still expanding.

;

;Since the counterpart cooperation between Guangzhou City and Longyan City, the two places have established a cultural tourism city alliance, 64 travel agencies (business associations) have established cooperative relations, and 47 national A-level tourist attractions in Longyan City have implemented the first-class tourism services for Guangzhou citizens. Free admission policy. In the first eight months of this year, about 470,000 tourists from Guangzhou visited Longyan, a year-on-year increase of 163%.

;

;From September 7th to 8th, the Guangzhou Municipal Party and Government delegation went to Longyan City for study and exchange, during which a signing ceremony for key cooperation projects between the two places was held. This time, 30 projects were signed with a total investment of 40.38 billion yuan, including 24 industrial projects with a total investment of 33.68 billion yuan.

;

;“Currently, Guangzhou is deeply studying and implementing the spirit of General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important speech during his inspection of Guangdong, continuing to play a leading and locomotive role in high-quality development, and better serving the overall development of the country and the province. Guangzhou focuses on promoting To achieve common prosperity, strengthen in-depth and high-quality cooperation in multiple fields, and work together in the Chinese-style modernization drive with new atmosphere and new actions." said Guo Yonghang, member of the Standing Committee of the Guangdong Provincial Party Committee, Secretary of the Guangzhou Municipal Party Committee, and Mayor of Guangzhou.

;

;From the old district to the Bay Area, from the plateau to the seaside, although the mountains and seas are far away, our dreams come true!

; Thu, 21 Sep 2023 06:26:06 +0800 01版要闻 - 云南全力打造中老铁路黄金线路http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/21/nw.D110000renmrb_20230921_6-01.htm
;Thursday, September 21, 2023
; ;

;International freight transport increased from an average of 2 trains per day to an average of 14 trains per day, and the number of transported goods increased from more than 10 kinds to more than 2,000 In this way, the overall customs clearance time for import and export of goods has been reduced by more than half compared with the initial period of opening... In the more than a year since the opening of the China-Laos Railway, the quality of the golden line has become more and more abundant. As of August 31, the China-Laos Railway has completed a cumulative freight volume of 25.22 million tons, with arrival locations and cargo origins involving 25 domestic provinces; the China-Laos railway transportation network has radiated to 13 countries and regions.

;

;On December 3, 2021, when General Secretary Xi Jinping attended the opening ceremony of the China-Laos railway via video link, he pointed out that both parties must make persistent efforts and do well to maintain and operate the railway well, develop and develop the railway along the line. Build it well and create a golden line to benefit the people of both countries.

;

;Yunnan Province has thoroughly implemented the spirit of General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important instructions, formulated and implemented a three-year action plan, focusing on channel capacity improvement, logistics hub construction, industry development along the line and business entity cultivation, and making every effort to build the China-Laos railway golden line .

;

;To transform "a line" into "a network", Yunnan strives to improve channel capabilities, build logistics hubs, and amplify the radiation effect of the China-Laos railway.

;

;On July 2, a train carrying auto parts and other goods departed from Rayong Province, Thailand, entered Yunnan from Mohan Port via the China-Laos Railway, and went all the way north to Chengdu, Sichuan, where it was converted into a China-Europe train. Finally arrived in Budapest, the capital of Hungary. This is the first cargo train to be transported across the border in the "China-Laos Railway + China-Europe Express" mode after the opening of the "Lancang-Mekong-Rongcheng-Europe Express Line". It is also an important exploration in Yunnan's efforts to improve channel capabilities and build a logistics hub.

;

;Yunnan continues to strengthen the construction of important logistics hubs and node networks along the China-Laos railway, and strives to build a regional international freight train assembly center. Kunming City is building three core hubs of land port, airport and commercial service channels, and Pu'er City is promoting the "all-access, interconnection" of county highways within the territory...

;

;Pragmatic planning based on location advantages , Yunnan focuses on promoting industrial development and cultivating business entities along the China-Laos railway, and continues to optimize and upgrade its industrial structure.

;

;The deep processing of agricultural and forestry products, food, light industry, environmentally friendly building materials, etc. are becoming key industries for development. Kunming City is working hard to build the "logistics + plateau agricultural and sideline products + new digital highland" industry. Yuxi City has established a special team to promote the development of green steel, biomedicine, and green food. Pu'er City relies on Ning'er Hani and Yi Autonomous County Railway Station Cold Chain Logistics Park and other agricultural and forestry products industries are developed, while Xishuangbanna Dai Autonomous Prefecture focuses on cultivating cultural tourism and health care, natural rubber industry and port economy. In the first half of this year, the four states (cities) along the China-Laos Railway in Yunnan signed a total of 350 projects and held 38 business negotiations, with a total contract value of nearly 100 billion yuan.

;

;The relevant person in charge of the Yunnan Provincial Development and Reform Commission said that the China-Laos Railway has transformed the abundant agricultural, forestry and other resource advantages along the line into economic advantages, "installing an engine" for the development of industries along the line.

;

;In May 2022, Yunnan handed over the entire Mohan Town under the jurisdiction of Xishuangbanna Prefecture to Kunming City for trusteeship. Mohan Town focuses on the development of international commerce, processing and manufacturing, and modern logistics, and coordinates the development of international finance, international tourism, education, medical and other industries. Last year, Mohan Town’s total foreign trade import and export volume nearly doubled year-on-year. In the first half of this year, the total import and export trade volume of Mohan Town was 23.413 billion yuan, an increase of 3.5%.

; Thu, 21 Sep 2023 06:26:06 +0800 02版要闻 - 传承飞虎队精神 推动中美民间友好http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/21/nw.D110000renmrb_20230921_1-02.htm
;Thursday, September 21, 2023
; ;

;On September 12, President Xi Jinping replied to the letter to Green, Chairman of the U.S.-China Aviation Heritage Foundation, and Flying Tigers veterans Moyer and Mike Mullen stressed that "the healthy and stable development of Sino-US relations in the new era requires the participation and support of the Flying Tigers in the new era. It is hoped that the spirit of the Flying Tigers can be passed down from generation to generation between the two peoples."

;

;“习近平主席的复信意义重大”“友谊、尊重、理解对两国来说很重要”“鼓舞我们朝着更光明的未来前进”……飞虎队老兵和美国学者表示，传承飞虎队精神、推动美中民间友好对于两国关系来说极为重要，美中应当书写更多像飞虎队一样的合作故事，在前辈结下的友谊基础上继续前进。

;

; ; “体现了对两国人民友谊的珍视”;

;

;美中航空遗产基金会成立于1998年，是旨在促进中美航空历史事件研究和纪念的美国民间友好团体。近日，基金会主席格林和飞虎队老兵莫耶、麦克马伦共同致信习近平主席，介绍基金会和飞虎队老兵支持推动两国友好交往的情况，表示将传承和弘扬中美合作的宝贵精神财富。

;

;“习近平主席的复信意义重大，感谢习近平主席关心飞虎队老兵及其家属。习近平主席肯定美中航空遗产基金会为传承和发扬飞虎队精神作出的贡献，是对我们的巨大鼓舞。”格林表示。

;

;飞虎队老兵莫耶和麦克马伦都已百岁左右，仍在努力推动中美民间友好。今年秋冬时节，美中航空遗产基金会、中国人民对外友好协会及中国多个省市将共同举办“铭记英雄——纪念飞虎队及第十四航空队援华80周年图片展”，莫耶和麦克马伦将再次来华。

;

;莫耶在收到习近平主席的复信后对本报记者表示：“飞虎队精神给美中两国带来诸多有益启示。过去，美中两国军民舍生忘死、并肩作战，结下深厚友谊。美中友好合作造福两国人民。当前，美中需要加强合作，这将对我们共同的未来产生深远影响。”

;

;“习近平主席复信体现了对两国人民友谊的珍视。”麦克马伦说，飞虎队精神是美中两国友谊与合作的象征，希望两国年轻一代继续传承和发扬飞虎队精神，祝愿美中关系稳定发展。

;

;;“美中之间可以合作，而且必须合作”;

;

;1941年，美国陈纳德将军组建“中国空军美国志愿援华航空队”（飞虎队），与中国军民共同抗击日本侵略者。飞虎队共击落日本军机2600多架，击沉、击伤舰船44艘，击毙日军6万多人。飞虎队员与中国军民并肩作战，书写了中美关系史上的珍贵一页。

;

;习近平主席在复信中强调，追忆往昔，中美两国人民在抗击日本法西斯的斗争中同仇敌忾，经受了血与火的考验，结下了深厚友谊。展望未来，中美作为两个大国，对世界的和平、稳定与发展负有更加重要的责任，应该也必须实现相互尊重、和平共处、合作共赢。

;

;“飞虎队精神跨越时空，象征着友谊和合作，是美中两国人民共同的精神遗产。”格林表示。

;

;美中航空遗产基金会迄今已组织带领近500名飞虎队老兵以及数百名老兵家属到访中国，他们的足迹遍布中国12个省份的25个城市，受到了中国人民的热情欢迎。飞虎队老兵们惊叹于中国的发展变化，为中国取得的巨大成就感到高兴。 “美中之间可以合作，而且必须合作，这是我们的坚定信念。我们希望通过举办一系列活动，在美中两国年轻一代中传播友好和合作理念。我们告诉很多美国人，中国和他们想象的不一样，友谊、尊重、理解对两国来说很重要。”格林说。

;

;美国新墨西哥州立大学历史学教授肯尼思·哈蒙德对本报记者表示，习近平主席近来多次复信美国友人，这提醒人们，美中两国合作历史悠久，民众之间有着深厚的情谊。当前，重温美中两国在80多年前结下的友谊，对两国关系的发展很有启发。 “习近平主席的复信鼓舞我们朝着更光明的未来前进。”哈蒙德说，美中两国面临着不少共同挑战，应该通过合作解决问题。

;

; ; “为深化两国民间友好带来积极影响”;

;

;习近平主席在复信中指出，中美关系的希望在人民，基础在民间，未来在青年。格林对此深表认同。他表示，80多年前，许多美国年轻人加入飞虎队，同中国人民并肩作战，共同抗击日本法西斯侵略，这段历史体现出美中合作与友谊的力量。如今，虽然在世的老一辈飞虎队成员越来越少，但听着飞虎队故事长大的年轻一代理解美中之间建立良好、牢固合作关系的重要性。

;

;美中航空遗产基金会友谊学校项目主任、飞虎队老兵后代玛格丽特·金坎农对本报记者表示：“习近平主席复信中鼓舞人心的话语让我们相信，美中两国人民80多年前形成的飞虎队精神，今天依然能为深化两国民间友好带来积极影响。我很高兴能参与到弘扬飞虎队精神的努力中来。”

;

;美国库恩基金会主席罗伯特·劳伦斯·库恩表示，习近平主席复信美国友好人士，展现了习近平主席对美中民间友好的重视。这些复信对推动美中关系健康稳定发展具有重大意义。

;; Thu, 21 Sep 2023 06:26:06 +0800 02版要闻 - 共建和平、安宁、繁荣、美丽、友好的家园（和音）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/21/nw.D110000renmrb_20230921_2-02.htm
;2023年09月21日星期四
; ;

;中国过去是、现在是、将来也永远是东盟的好邻居、好朋友、好伙伴。站在新的历史起点，中国将继续与东盟国家在携手发展、互利共赢的道路上同舟共济、精诚合作

;

;

;

;9月19日，为期4天的第二十届中国—东盟博览会和中国—东盟商务与投资峰会在广西南宁闭幕。今年是习近平主席提出共建“一带一路”倡议和建设更为紧密的中国—东盟命运共同体10周年，也是东博会和投资峰会创办20周年。本届东博会和投资峰会的成功举办体现了中国和东盟共谋发展、合作共赢的坚定决心，为构建更为紧密的中国—东盟命运共同体注入了新动力。

;

;东博会和投资峰会见证了中国和东盟关系的不断发展。20年前，中国作为对话伙伴国家率先加入《东南亚友好合作条约》，与东盟建立起面向和平与繁荣的战略伙伴关系。10年前，习近平主席在印度尼西亚国会发表重要演讲，提出愿同东盟国家共建21世纪海上丝绸之路，携手共建更为紧密的中国—东盟命运共同体，得到东盟各国积极响应。2年前，在中国—东盟建立对话关系30周年纪念峰会上，习近平主席提出共建和平、安宁、繁荣、美丽、友好“五大家园”，为中国—东盟合作擘画崭新蓝图、指明前进方向。中国和东盟坚持团结自强、合作共赢，共同守护了地区和平与安宁，共同创造了经济腾飞的奇迹。

;

;东博会和投资峰会见证了中国和东盟经贸合作稳步升级。本届东博会和投资峰会签约项目数量和总投资额均创历届之最，亮眼的成绩单折射出各方对中国经济发展、市场繁荣的坚定信心，也真切反映出中国与东盟经贸合作的深度和热度。中国与东盟双边贸易额从2004年的1000多亿美元增长至2022年的9753.4亿美元，中国连续14年保持东盟最大贸易伙伴地位，双方已连续3年互为最大贸易伙伴，累计双向投资总额超过了3800亿美元。当前，中国和东盟正积极推进自贸区3.0版谈判，将全面提升中国—东盟经贸制度型开放水平。中国—东盟关系已经成为亚太区域合作中最成功的和最具活力的典范，成为推动构建人类命运共同体的生动例证。

;

;本届东博会和投资峰会以“和合共生建家园，命运与共向未来——推动'一带一路'高质量发展和打造经济增长中心”为主题，展现了开放合作的鲜明态度。东盟国家是高质量共建“一带一路”的优先方向和重点地区。共建“一带一路”同东盟互联互通总体规划加快对接，大量促发展、惠民生的项目落地生根，为双方人民带去实实在在的好处。“老挝将继续与东盟和中国保持密切合作，为落实共建'一带一路'倡议作出积极贡献”“马来西亚愿同中方全力合作，推进高质量共建'一带一路'”“泰国的发展政策和中国提出的'一带一路'倡议相契合”……东盟国家纷纷表示愿继续同中方高质量共建“一带一路”，充分表明“一带一路”已成为中国和东盟国家的互利共赢之路，双方高质量共建“一带一路”必将越走越深、越走越实。

;

;世界进入新的动荡变革期，不稳定性不确定性明显增加。中国和东盟国家将进一步深化感情的交融，进一步夯实信任的根基，进一步拉紧利益的纽带，进一步扩展开放的胸襟，共同做地区和平的建设者、合作共赢的倡导者、全人类共同价值的捍卫者，朝着构建更为紧密的中国—东盟命运共同体方向不断努力。中国奉行亲诚惠容的周边外交理念，一向坚持与邻为善、以邻为伴。未来，中方将在践行亲诚惠容方面下更大功夫，携手地区国家营造有利于发展繁荣、和平安宁的良好环境，把发展进步的命运牢牢掌握在自己手中。

;

;“相聚到永久，风雨并肩走，共患难，我们手牵手，永远是朋友……”响彻会场的东博会主题曲唱出了中国和东盟国家和合共生、命运与共的要义。中国过去是、现在是、将来也永远是东盟的好邻居、好朋友、好伙伴。站在新的历史起点，中国将继续与东盟国家在携手发展、互利共赢的道路上同舟共济、精诚合作，共建和平、安宁、繁荣、美丽、友好的家园。

;; Thu, 21 Sep 2023 06:26:06 +0800 02版要闻 - 高举共同发展旗帜 同行人类进步正道http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/21/nw.D110000renmrb_20230921_3-02.htm
;2023年09月21日星期四
; ;

;“发展是解决一切问题的总钥匙。”

;

;全球经济波动下行，地缘政治危机升级，发展失衡加剧，单边主义、保护主义抬头……面对层出不穷的全球性挑战，国际社会对共同发展的期盼愈发殷切，共同发展理念在实践中日益深入人心。

;

;2021年9月21日，国家主席习近平在第七十六届联合国大会一般性辩论上发表重要讲话，提出全球发展倡议，为推动国际社会形成合力，破解发展赤字难题，实现联合国2030年可持续发展议程贡献了中国方案和中国智慧。

;

;大道不孤，众行致远。

;

;全球发展倡议提出两年来，有效凝聚了共促发展的国际共识，回应了国际社会的最迫切需要，得到了国际社会广泛赞誉。全球发展倡议的提出和推进落实，顺应人心所向，为世界携手共同发展注入更多动力，展现了中国担当。

;

;;应对全球挑战;

;

;;贡献中国智慧;

;

;发展承载着人民对美好生活的向往，是发展中国家的第一要务，也是人类社会永恒主题。百年变局加速演进，发展中国家群体性崛起的历史潮流不可逆转，团结协作、共谋发展的呼声和意愿前所未有强烈。如何解决发展赤字、破解发展困境成为人类社会面临的时代课题。

;

;“我提出全球发展倡议，就是为了让全世界聚焦发展，为落实可持续发展议程提供助力。”从2021年9月在第七十六届联合国大会一般性辩论上提出全球发展倡议，到2022年6月主持全球发展高层对话会宣布32项务实举措，再到2023年8月出席“金砖+”领导人对话会就全球发展合作作出重要阐述，习近平主席始终着眼全球共同发展的长远目标和现实需要，提出全球发展倡议并不断丰富其内涵，引领推动这一重大倡议落地生根、走深走实，为促进各国共同发展注入强大动力。

;

;在全球发展倡议提出两周年之际，全球发展倡议合作成果展示高级别会议当地时间19日在纽约联合国总部举行，新华社国家高端智库在会议期间发布了《全球发展倡议实践成就与世界贡献》智库报告，全面梳理全球发展倡议提出两年来取得的丰硕成果，系统阐述这一重大倡议的理念和原则及世界意义。

;

;出席会议的联合国南南合作办公室基金主任王晓军接受新华社记者采访时说，报告展示的一个个案例表明全球发展倡议给世界各国人民带来了好处，包括在蒙古国建设宜居住房、为尼泊尔和柬埔寨学校供餐提供支持、在非洲国家发起“以竹代塑”行动、为巴勒斯坦难民提供新冠疫苗援助等。这些案例生动展现了全球发展倡议合作领域的全面性。

;

;王晓军认为，全球发展倡议的理念高度契合当今世界所需，在构筑南南、三方合作全球伙伴关系等方面，开创了开放、包容的国际发展合作新模式。世界正面临复杂挑战，全球发展倡议有力推动将发展问题置于国际议程的中心位置。

;

;美国库恩基金会主席罗伯特·劳伦斯·库恩说，全球发展倡议基于中国自身发展经验，解决全球发展难题，同时通过一个个具体行动使广大发展中国家受益，对全球发展具有重要现实意义。

;

;“习近平主席的倡议，将饱受冲击的可持续发展目标重新带回全球多边议程的核心位置。”所罗门群岛总理索加瓦雷说。斯洛文尼亚前总统图尔克表示：“中国的全球发展倡议为应对全球的发展挑战提供关键的建设性力量。”

;

;致力于实现更加强劲、绿色、健康的全球发展，共创普惠平衡、协调包容、合作共赢、共同繁荣的发展格局，全球发展倡议自提出以来，理念内涵不断丰富、落实机制不断健全、推进路径更加清晰、务实合作逐步落地，有力回应全球性挑战和广大发展中国家的发展需求。埃塞俄比亚战略事务研究所高级研究员梅拉库·穆卢阿莱姆说：“无论是思想引领还是实施领域，全球发展倡议都为各国提供了清晰的路线图。”

;

;作为世界上最大的发展中国家和全球南方的天然成员，中国始终把自身发展置于人类发展的坐标系中，秉持以人民为中心的发展理念，积极同各国分享经验、提供助力，推动全球南南合作行稳致远。从深化抗疫国际合作，到助力国际减贫事业；从帮助非洲等发展中国家减缓债务压力，到促进全球贸易、数字经济、绿色转型，再到确保粮食和能源安全，中国始终和广大发展中国家并肩奋斗，为全球发展事业作出积极贡献。

;

;尼加拉瓜总统奥尔特加说：“中国对亚非拉人民的帮助没有附加条件，为促进发展中国家的社会进步和人民福祉作出重要贡献。”英国国际关系顾问基思·贝内特表示：“习近平主席提出的'以人民为中心''努力不让任何一个国家掉队'等理念，对提升全球发展的公平性、有效性、包容性至关重要，受到国际社会的广泛认可和普遍欢迎。”

;

;;破解发展瓶颈;

;

;;注入中国动力;

;

;在新冠疫情流行、地缘冲突加剧、美西方推动“脱钩断链”和极端财政货币政策等负面因素影响下，近年来全球发展瓶颈日益突出，全球减贫成果受到冲击，一些新兴市场增速放缓，粮食能源危机等挑战交织，高通胀令多国民生面临困顿。

;

;“世界变乱交织的根源是缺乏发展。”南非约翰内斯堡大学非洲—中国研究中心主任戴维·蒙亚埃说，“推进落实全球发展倡议，将有助于减少挑战和缓解危机，进而强化我们的安全。”

;

;日本立命馆大学教授周玮生认为，中国作为发展中国家，在40多年改革开放过程中，积累了诸多宝贵发展经验。全球发展倡议既基于中国发展经验，又基于人类可持续发展大目标，具有重大现实意义和可操作性。

;

;“全球发展倡议聚焦发展瓶颈，相关国家从中受益匪浅。”长期关注研究中国发展的库恩认为，中国的专业知识和经验为发展中国家提供长期、关键的支持。

;

;全球发展倡议聚焦绿色发展、新型工业化、数字经济等重点领域，推进新工业革命伙伴关系建设，助力高质量发展。

;

;在东南亚和非洲，中国企业依托云计算、电子商务、金融科技等新业态，促进各方经贸往来，助力优化当地发展环境。在拉美和中亚，中企参与风电场、水电站、光伏电站等项目助力当地向低碳转型。在全球多地，互联互通成果丰硕，中老铁路、柬埔寨斯登特朗—格罗奇马湄公河大桥等合作项目极大便利了当地交通，对经济和社会发展起到显著拉动作用。

;

;老挝资深外交官西昆表示，当今世界仍面临疫后复苏乏力、乌克兰危机等挑战，老挝也受到影响，但因为有中老铁路，老挝旅游业得以较快复苏，货物运输更为顺畅，这帮助老挝经济得以从重重挑战中较快恢复。

;

;“中国在帮助各国摆脱贫困方面，始终满怀诚意并展开积极行动。”巴西中国问题研究中心主任罗尼·林斯表示，全球发展倡议提出两年来，中国在促进全球南方发展方面展现出更强大的行动力，为包括拉美国家在内的广大发展中国家创造了更多的发展机遇，发挥了改善民生的作用，这有利于世界经济和人类社会的可持续发展。

;

;埃及开罗大学经济与金融法教授瓦利德·贾巴拉表示，中国提出了关于发展的解决方案，许多国家都希望利用这些“钥匙”来解决他们的发展问题。“我们每天都能看到中国的倡议在实实在在的项目中得到体现。”

;

; ; 共启发展新程  ;

;

; ; ;;展现中国担当;

;

;国际形势越是复杂严峻，就越需要各国坚持真正的多边主义，全球发展离不开国际合作。中国高举多边主义旗帜，以开放包容、合作共赢理念汇聚全球发展合力，展现大国担当。

;

;德国智库席勒研究所创始人兼主席黑尔佳·策普·拉鲁什认为，当前世界必须停止边缘政策，摆脱单边主义。习近平主席提出的全球发展倡议等多项主张，有利于化解当前困局。

;

;“国际社会要以天下之利为利、以人民之心为心，推动发展问题重回国际议程的核心。”中国已向160多个国家提供发展援助，同150多个国家携手共建“一带一路”，同100多个国家和国际组织共同推进全球发展倡议合作。

;

;在不久前举行的“金砖+”领导人对话会上，习近平主席宣布，中方已经成立总额40亿美元的全球发展和南南合作基金，中国金融机构即将推出100亿美元专项资金，专门用于落实全球发展倡议。

;

;从亚洲到非洲，从太平洋岛国到加勒比海岸，200多个合作项目开花结果，减贫、教育、卫生等领域合作机制不断拓展。中方启动中国—联合国粮农组织南南合作信托基金，落实促进粮食生产专项行动，分享农业技术知识；发起全球清洁能源合作伙伴关系，助力实现能源安全。

;

;对于全球发展倡议，习近平主席说：“这个倡议是向全世界开放的公共产品，旨在对接联合国2030年可持续发展议程，推动全球共同发展。中国愿同各方携手合作，共同推进倡议落地，努力不让任何一个国家掉队。”

;

;对此，贾巴拉有深切的感触。他说，全球发展倡议旨在通过促进合作和建立伙伴关系，引导世界走向更好未来，这体现了中国人的包容精神。

;

;中华民族追求“大道之行、天下为公”、崇尚“亲仁善邻、协和万邦”、倡导“和衷共济、守望相助”。全球发展倡议，正是根植于这样的中华优秀传统文化，致力于推动国际社会不断增进合作共识，加强各层面发展战略对接，拓宽合作渠道，最终实现携手发展，共同进步。

;

;德不孤，必有邻。目前，已有100多个国家和国际组织支持全球发展倡议，70多国加入“全球发展倡议之友小组”，全球发展倡议写入中国同中亚、东盟、非洲、拉美、太平洋岛国等一系列合作文件……中国愿同世界上一切进步力量一道，打造团结、平等、均衡、普惠的高质量全球发展伙伴关系，开启构建全球发展命运共同体的新征程，共同迈向更加繁荣美好的未来。

;

;（新华社北京9月20日电  综合新华社驻外记者报道，执笔记者：邓茜、蒋励、陈杉、高文成）

;本报圣彼得堡9月20日电  （记者隋鑫）当地时间9月20日，俄罗斯总统普京在圣彼得堡会见中共中央政治局委员、中央外办主任王毅。

;

;普京请王毅转达对习近平主席的诚挚问候，表示今年3月，习近平主席对俄罗斯进行具有划时代意义的访问，取得圆满成功，体现了俄中全面战略协作伙伴关系的高水平。自那以来，双方达成的重要共识正在逐一落实，两国经贸、人文、体育等各领域交流合作取得积极成果。今年以来，俄罗斯已克服美西方单边制裁冲击，经济开始恢复增长，各种机能正常运转，我们期待同中方加强规划，深化务实合作。俄方高度赞赏并积极支持共建“一带一路”倡议，反对对倡议的歪曲抹黑，愿加强欧亚经济联盟同倡议对接，推进地区一体化进程。

;

;普京说，当前国际局势演变充分印证了习近平主席对百年未有大变局的战略判断。在俄中等各方共同努力下，金砖国家今年成功扩员，推动金砖合作迈上新台阶。俄方愿同中方在上海合作组织、金砖机制等多边框架下保持密切协调，抵制单极霸权和阵营对抗，维护国际公平正义。

;

;王毅转达了习近平主席对普京总统的亲切问候，表示两国元首今年成功会晤，共同擘画了新时代中俄全面战略协作伙伴关系新的蓝图，为推动双边关系深入发展指明了前进方向、注入了强劲动力。这次访俄期间，我同帕特鲁舍夫安秘和拉夫罗夫外长全面梳理了两国各领域合作，愿同俄方一道，以两国元首重要共识为根本遵循，增进战略互信，深化务实合作，进一步夯实中俄友好的民意和社会基础。

;

;王毅说，习近平主席强调世界进入百年未有之大变局。面对变乱交织的国际局势，世界多极化加速演进，经济全球化逆势前行，单边行径不可持续，霸权主义不得人心。中俄作为联合国安理会常任理事国，对推动世界发展进步负有重要责任。双方要加强多边战略协作，维护两国正当权益，为推动国际秩序朝着公正合理方向发展作出新的努力。

;

;双方还就当前国际和地区形势交换了意见。在乌克兰问题上，普京重申俄方愿通过对话谈判解决问题。

;

;访俄期间，王毅还与俄方共同主持中俄第十八轮战略安全磋商，举行中俄蒙安全事务高级代表会晤，并分别会见俄罗斯外长拉夫罗夫、蒙古国国家安全委员会秘书长恩赫巴亚尔。
